David K. Caplan 
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP 
9720 Wilshire Blvd., Penthouse Suite

U.S.A.

Fax: (310) 860-0363 
 
March 31, 2007 
 
 
VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL 
 
Everyones Internet 
390 Benmar Suite 200 
Houston, Texas 
77060 
 
abuse@ev1servers.net; mirion@creativewing.com; support@domainpeople.com

 
        Re:        Unauthorized Use of Paramount Pictures Corporation 
Properties 
        http://www.wingsclips.com 
 
To Whom It May Concern: 
 
        This letter is being written to you on behalf of Paramount 
Pictures Corporation (hereinafter "Paramount"). Paramount is the owner 
of rights in and to the "Nacho Libre" "Charlotte's Web" and "World Trade

Center" motion pictures (hereinafter collectively referred to as 
"Paramount Properties").  No one is authorized to copy, reproduce, 
distribute, or otherwise use the Paramount Properties without the 
express written permission of Paramount. 
 
       It has been brought to our attention that the website located at 
"http://www.wingsclips.com," for which you are the service provider, is 
distributing, displaying, and reproducing, unauthorized copies of the 
Paramount Properties. The specific URLs from which these unauthorized 
copies are being distributed, displayed and reproduced are: 
 
Nacho Libre 
1.    http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=category&category_id=479  
2. 
http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=product&product_id=16185&category_i

d=479  
3. 
http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=product&product_id=16186&category_i

d=479  
4. 
http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=product&product_id=16184&category_i

d=479  
 
World Trade Center 
1. 
http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=search&substring=world+trade+center

 
2. 
http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=product&product_id=16241&substring=

world+trade+center  
3. 
http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=product&product_id=16242&substring=

world+trade+center  
 
Charlotte's Web 
1. 
http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=search&target=search&substring=char

lotte  
2. 
http://wingclips.com/cart.php?target=product&product_id=16239&substring=

charlotte  
 
        Paramount has the good faith belief that the use of the material

in the manner complained of is not authorized by Paramount, its agent or

the law.  Paramount diligently enforces its rights in and to the 
Paramount Properties in all forms of media.  Our client rightfully takes

its responsibility for the protection of the Paramount Properties very 
seriously. 
 
        As you may be aware, Internet Service Providers can be held 
liable if they do not respond to claims of infringement pursuant to the 
requirements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) and/or 
international laws with similar effect.  In accordance with the DMCA, we

request your assistance in the removal of infringements of the Paramount

Properties from this web site and any other sites for which you act as 
an Internet Service Provider.  We further declare under penalty of 
perjury that we are authorized to act on behalf of Paramount and that 
the information in this letter is accurate.   
 
Nothing contained in this letter constitutes an express or implied 
waiver of any rights, remedies or defenses of Paramount, all of which 
are expressly reserved. 
 
Very truly yours, 
/s/ 
David K. Caplan 
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP 
 
DKC:vf 
cc:        Paramount Pictures Corporation
